nbd_url.title: NBD server URL
nbd_url.description: URL to be used to boot another VM. Requires IPv6. IPv6 should be used as "NBD hostname" and port as "NBD port"

upload_url.title: Upload URL
upload_url.description: URL used to upload your VM image.

upload_key.title: Upload key
upload_key.description: Key used to upload your VM image.
